CustomField.formula: "The Initial Term of this Order and Sale Agreement "&SBQQ__MasterContract__r.ContractNumber&" (\"OSA\") shall commence upon the Effective Date of this OSA and continue for a "&TEXT(SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c)&" month term. Thereafter, each Renewal Term of this OSA, if any, shall run for an annual term and will be subject to the General Terms and Conditions."
CustomField.label: Extended Terms Language
